node.title: Hashnode Started Giving Crypto Rewards
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Hashnode is StackOverflow like community where you can ask questions, have discussions, create poll etc. According to Hasnode "Hashnode is a platform built and optimised for developers by developers. You can ask, answer, write story, share and discover links here. üç∫ Hmm‚Ä¶ You can place us somewhere between Quora and StackOverflow."

Recently they have introduced Crypto Rewards (XLM) for asking great questions or answers. As of now they have introduced the Stellar Rewards for Good Questions and Answers which is selected by their team.

Full News : https://hashnode.com/crypto-rewards

I think it is a very bold move and people will engage more and more with the community.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmS3p8637DzeNKRjZZGfmuCR7Jh9wJXcsrjVb7UeJUu2nX/image.png)
PC :  https://hashnode.com/crypto-rewards

node.title: Phishing Link Checker Chrome Extension
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
The video helps to get in speed with what CheckSteemitLink Extension does, what all the features it has. This extension checks the phishing link in Steemit. A lot and lot of people are losing their hard-earned because of the phishing links all over the place. This chrome extension helps you warn before hand if it finds Phishing Links. It will show below which link you are on.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è DTube
‚ñ∂Ô∏è IPFS

node.title: Phishing Link Checker Chrome Extension - Update V1.1 and V1.2
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
### New Features ##### In V1.1 1 - Running the Script every 10 seconds so that if you go from any page in Steemit all the information should be up to date. Commit : [5c5e5f8106c2cf5d7b8dfa856749de1c81ca465e](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/ae380f9176699e72f9bddc7f3533a3caea6e7f2e) 2 - Whenever you click on any link it will alert you saying that the site you are going to is not a Steemit site and so do not use your password there. Commit : [5c5e5f8106c2cf5d7b8dfa856749de1c81ca465e](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/5c5e5f8106c2cf5d7b8dfa856749de1c81ca465e) ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521272550/edhzz0ufxtvmajzzeukt.png) ##### In V1.2 1 - Added Popup which will give details about the Extension and the Current Site you are in. Commits : [1](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/43dd60284d8e0f27a63644e44e6233a75a1f6f41),[2](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/41dc3bb15fd3d2da16ee15f495724eb28283dd92) and [3](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/263c0728fe151bded2f543b3ef14168c767c468e) ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521272736/zc6ai0kh1rffrcyzvmt4.png) 2 - Update Maifest.json to include all the details. Commit : [de0bc88cae54e0f7cc2b9f2ad9c5aed826c3bbbc](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/de0bc88cae54e0f7cc2b9f2ad9c5aed826c3bbbc) #### Technology Stack JavaScript #### Roadmap - Add more Phishing Websites Known - More Logic to Find out about Phishing Websites #### How to contribute? Create a PR for this Repo :https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink. Also you can add suggestion or errors as an Issue in GitHub. #### Download Chrome Webstore : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/checksteemitlink/jfbjdjokbmnclfboljafdmcfafamkacd
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

node.title: Phishing Link Checker Chrome Extension
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Lot and lot of people are losing their hard-earned money because of the phishing links all over the steemit. This chrome extension helps you warn beforehand if it finds Phishing Links in Steemit.com. As of now the work done is 1 - If you go to Steemit-Rewards site it will alert you saying it is not Steemit Site, as it id one of the Phishing Site known. Will be adding more in future. 2 - Any Link in the Memo is not a Steemit Link it will give you a warining as shown below, where it will tell you beforehand that it is not a Steemit link. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1520941170/xr58mad34ulza6tl66dv.png) 3 - If any website ask for password, and if it is not a steemit or busy or utopian, it will give you a warning as an alert that it is not a Steemit Website. #### Technology Stack JavaScript #### Roadmap - Add more Phishing Websites Known - More Logic to Find out about Phishing Websites #### How to contribute? Create a PR for this Repo :https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink. Also you can add suggestion or errors as an Issue in GitHub. #### Download Chrome Webstore : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/checksteemitlink/jfbjdjokbmnclfboljafdmcfafamkacd
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

node.title: Use Bid Bot Intelligently
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
See the below image people have send the bid to the bot even though it's giving -50% ROI. Why would you do that?

When in doubt always use https://steembottracker.com/, and then check what is the ROI Limit of any bot before sending the money. Most of them does not give any details about it then there are Bots which has a capped value of 10% or 15% ROI, so that Bid Bot will not receive any bids if the ROI goes below that threshhold.

![BotTracker.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcWkVbwFM4HSYirgBiuMTnRPbN9scHn4yy8mKXt6NnQD5/BotTracker.png)

# Use BidBot Intelligently, Check ROI before investment

node.title: Quality Slider Bug in Utopian
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
#### Expected behavior When the Quality Slider is at 0%, the Moderator should not be allowed to click "Yes,Verify" or should be given a warning saying that "Please Set the Quality Slider". If I need to set 0 as a quality slider I do not have to move the slider and bring it back to 0. #### Actual behavior On Initial Load when you have not clicked on Quality Slider, I get a warning saying "Please Set the Quality Slider", so after moving the quality slider and bringing it back to 0% does not give me the warning. #### How to reproduce - Moderators click on Verify Button - Fill all the questionnaire except Quality Slider - Click on "Yes, Verify", you will get a warning "Please Set the Quality Slider". - Move the slider and bring it back to 0, and click on "Yes, Verify". * Browser: Chrome * Operating system: Windows 10 #### Recording Of The Bug
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
